title: Spacious and elegant! You've found your ideal 1 bed / 1 bath!
posting_body: ['Welcome to Residences on Bedford', 'Rental Information', 'Pricing:', '$2080 - $2276/Month | 1 Bedroom 1 Bath | 768 sq ft', 'Lease Term:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month, 17-Month, 18-Month', '(203) 208-3262', 'Apartment Amenities', '− Air Conditioning', '− Balcony', '− Black Appliances', '− Blinds', '− Garage', '− Heating', '− Large, Private Balconies', '− Spectacular Views in Select Units', '− Stainless Steel appliances in Select Units', '− Storage Units', 'Community Features', '− 24 Hour Convenience Store', '− Bowling Alley', '− Business Center', '− Clubhouse', '− Fitness Center', '− Gas Grills', '− Parks Nearby', '− Pet Friendly', '− Play Area', '− Pool', '− 48-Hour Maintenance Commitment', '− Beautiful Picnic Areas', '− Close to Shopping, Dining, and Entertainment', '− Elegant Clubroom', '− Free Wi-Fi access in Common Areas', '− Ice Skating Rink **', 'Winter Only', '− Laundry Facilities on Every Floor', '− Near Downtown Stamford', '− Online Payments Available', 'About Community', 'Description:', 'YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', 'In real estate, they say location is everything and The Residences on Bedford is hard to beat.', 'Located right outside the heart of Stamford, CT, we are surrounded by tranquil neighborhoods, beautiful parks, and a spectacular view of Long Island Sound.', 'Our proximity to downtown Stamford provides our residents with quick access to nearby restaurants and beachside fun.', "No matter what your lifestyle, you'll love living at The Residences on Bedford.", 'Location:', '1425 Bedford St', 'Stamford, CT 06905', '(203) 208-3262', 'Office Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Additional Information', 'Pet Policy:', 'We charge a $500 non-refundable fee for each pet.', 'We also charge $75 for pet rent for each pet monthly.', 'Pet Types: Cats and Dogs', 'Breed restrictions apply', 'Weight Limit: 35 lbs.', 'Maximum pets per unit: 2', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Our Management Company:', 'JRK Property Holdings', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'FB4903307C3545']
